name: Gem Puzzle Fighter
description:
Play with other Device through Bluetooth.

Gem Puzzle Fighter is a puzzle game using Gems to attack opponent.

- 8 Characters to Select
- 1 Player against the Computer
- 2 Players Match with Same Device
- 2 Players Match with 2 Devices through Bluetooth

2 Control Modes:
- JoyStick
- Touch (Drag and Move, Quick Tap for Rotate)
